body:
Hi Amir,



I think running the container manually should solve it. Follow the last step (and its substeps) in FAQ [here](http://www.openfoam.com/download/install-binary-windows.php).



In case it doesn't work, try going through the options mentioned here-

[https://github.com/ladybug-analysis-tools/butterfly/issues/172](https://github.com/ladybug-analysis-tools/butterfly/issues/172)



Hope it helps.
